cyclone.name: NESTOR
cyclone.current_location: about 85 miles SW of Apalachicola, FL
cyclone.trajectory: tracking northeast across the Florida Panhandle and southeast Georgia, then turning east-northeast and moving offshore of the North Carolina coast

weather_observation.watch_coast: None in effect for Atlantic side of Florida
weather_observation.warning_coast: Tropical Storm Warning along Gulf coast from Navarre FL to Yankeetown FL (does not include Jacksonville)
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Florida Panhandle eastward across south-central Georgia and the coastal Carolinas; fringe impacts possible along northeast Florida Atlantic coast including Jacksonville
weather_observation.wind: Gusty east to northeast winds possible Saturday with a 15% chance of sustained tropical-storm-force (≥34 kt) winds
weather_observation.storm_surge: None expected on the Atlantic side near Jacksonville
weather_observation.rainfall: 2–4 inches widespread with locally higher totals up to 6 inches
weather_observation.other_hazards: Isolated tornadoes possible across the northern & central Florida Peninsula
